item.title: After reaching a market capitalization of $1.98 billion, YZY retraced, with a trading volume of $141 million.
item.description: On August 21st, based on GMGN market data, once Kanye West officially announced the launch of the YZY token, the market capitalization of YZY reached $1.98 billion. Currently, it stands at $1.45 billion, and the trading volume is $141 million.

item.title: YZY Token Economics: 20% Public Distribution, 30% Allocated to the Issuer and Locked Up for 3 Months
item.description: On August 21st, based on the information available on the official YZY MONEY website established by Kanye West, the YZY tokenomics is detailed as follows:· Public Distribution: 20%· Liquidity Pool: 10%· Yeezy Investments LLC (the Issuer): 30% (locked for 3 months and released linearly over 24 months)· Team: 20% (locked for 6 months and released linearly over 24 months)· Ecosystem Development Fund: 20% (locked for 12 months and released linearly over 24 months)

item.title: Kanye West Announces the Launch of YZY MONEY and the YZY Token
item.description: On August 21st, the renowned rapper and influencer Kanye West announced on social media the launch of YZY MONEY and the YZY token.Contract: DrZ26cKJDksVRWib3DVVsjo9eeXccc7hKhDJviiYEEZYBlockchain: Solana.

item.title: Either influenced by BNB and OKB reaching new highs, GT surged 13.5% in 24 hours
item.description: On August 21st, based on market data, it is likely that influenced by the FOMO sentiment after Binance's BNB and OKX's OKB reached historical highs, GateToken (GT) has seen a surge of 13.5% in the past 24 hours and is now trading at $18.7.

item.title: A new address withdrew 60,000 SOL from Binance, worth $11.23 million
item.description: On August 21st, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established address withdrew 60,000 SOL from Binance within the past 15 hours. The amount withdrawn was worth $11.23 million.

item.title: A whale address bought 2512 ETH 3 hours ago, with an average price of $4377.
item.description: On August 21st, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), an address spent 11 million DAI to purchase 2512.7 ETH on the blockchain 3 hours ago. The average price per ETH was $4377.76. Currently, these ETH have all been transferred to an address beginning with 0xB6F.

item.title: Affected by the new all-time high of OKB, HK Stock EuroCloudChain rose by 9.26%
item.description: On August 21st, based on market data, perhaps affected by OKB reaching a new high, the stock OKLink of OK Group rose by 9.26% and is now trading at HKD 0.59.

item.title: OKB Hits $190 to Reach New All-Time High, X Layer Ecosystem Meme Coin OKAY Market Cap Surpasses $11 Million
item.description: On August 21st, based on market data, OKB rose and touched $190, reaching a new all-time high. Currently, it is trading at $189.85 with a 24-hour increase of 51.82%.Moreover, within the X Layer ecosystem, the meme coin OKAY has exceeded a market capitalization of $11 million. It is now trading at $11.35 million, with a 24-hour gain of 182% and a 24-hour trading volume of $5.78 million. Although OKAY is not the platform token of the DEX in the X Layer ecosystem, Okoswap has introduced a trading mining mechanism based on OKAY.

item.title: Bloomberg: Arthur Hayes has recently made a significant investment in a human longevity extension company and has been receiving regular intravenous stem cell infusion therapy over the past year.
item.description: August 21st. According to Bloomberg, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, is shifting his investment focus to the realm of human life extension. He has recently made a substantial investment in a stem cell company that has clinics in Mexico and Bangkok and has joined its board of directors. In the past year, he has regularly flown to receive intravenous infusion treatments and has expressed that he "hopes to extend his life as healthily as possible." While the name of the company was not disclosed due to ongoing rebranding efforts, he emphasized: "This is a future trend - an increasing number of countries are loosening regulations on stem cell usage."

item.title: A Whale/Institution sold 10,000 ETH through Wintermute 4 hours ago
item.description: On August 21st, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale or institution sold 10,000 ETH for $43.35 million through Wintermute OTC four hours ago. Subsequently, it transferred the USDC to Aave V3.Currently, this whale or institution holds 10,003.66 ETH with a value of $43 million and holds $535 million worth of USDC on Aave V3.
